title: Happy Birthday, Rin!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Okay, open your eyes-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>W, wa....Waaaaa----!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Oh, that’s a nice reaction. How is it? Do you like the hair arrangement?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>It’s really really cute nya! Uwaa~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ahaha, it’s captivating, huh. Yeah, Ai is satisfied with this<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>This is Rin, huh.... It looks kinda nice and cute.... Rin thought that this hairstyle would only fit a girl like Kayochin or Kasumin.... and it wouldn’t really fit Rin, but....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Both Hanayo and Kasukasu are cute, but you also have your own cuteness, Rin. Ai tried to make it something that suits that♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ehehe, you’re making me blush nya-<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Alright, let’s go to where everyone else is. But before that.... Happy Birthday, Rin!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Thank you nya-, Ai-san!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
